about.name: Mohammed-Taqi Jalil
about.title: Data Analyst & Computational Biology Graduate
about.summary: I'm Mohammed‑Taqi Jalil, a data‑driven Computational Biology graduate based in Austin, TX. I build predictive models, streamline ETL workflows, and craft clear dashboards that turn data into action. Comfortable across Python, R, SQL, and BI tooling, I enjoy delivering statistically sound insights for healthcare, education, and environmental datasets.

responsibilities: Built Label Studio workflows for streamlined annotation for AI agents
Standardized heterogeneous XML to a unified golden dataset; validated via XSD
Aligned data prep with ML training across cross‑functional stakeholders
Analyzed student data; insights contributed to 15% increase in platform adoption
Automated ETL with SQL; reduced manual reporting time by 30%
Developed Tableau dashboards; supported regression analysis for interventions

education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin

projects.title: Ambient Air Pollution Prediction
projects.description: Built models (Random Forest, XGBoost, k‑NN, Lasso) to predict PM2.5 across the U.S.; performed EDA, feature selection, and cross‑validation using RMSE.
projects.problem: Predicting PM2.5 levels across the U.S. is challenging due to complex environmental factors, spatial variability, and the need for accurate real-time forecasting to support public health decisions.
projects.outcome: Built multiple predictive models (Random Forest, XGBoost, k-NN, Lasso) achieving competitive RMSE scores. Performed comprehensive EDA, feature selection, and cross-validation to ensure model reliability.

projects.title: RNA-Seq Gene Expression Analysis
projects.description: Differential expression with DESeq2; normalization, QC, and log fold‑change; visualized results with PCA, volcano plots, and heatmaps.
projects.problem: Identifying differentially expressed genes in RNA-Seq data requires robust statistical methods to handle count data, normalization challenges, and multiple testing corrections.
projects.outcome: Successfully performed differential expression analysis using DESeq2, with proper normalization and QC. Generated publication-quality visualizations including PCA plots, volcano plots, and heatmaps to identify key gene expression patterns.

projects.title: IntelliVest Investment Analytics Platform
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive investment analytics platform with real-time market data integration, portfolio optimization algorithms, and interactive dashboards for informed decision-making.
projects.problem: Investors need real-time market data, portfolio optimization tools, and interactive visualizations to make informed investment decisions efficiently.
projects.outcome: Developed a comprehensive investment analytics platform with real-time market data integration, portfolio optimization algorithms, and interactive dashboards. The platform enables users to analyze stocks, optimize portfolios, and visualize performance metrics.
